author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Put the water, sugar, cinnamon stick, saffron and honey into a pan and heat until the sugar has dissolved.  Simmer gently for five minutes before adding the apricots. Simmer for a further five minutes. Remove from the heat and discard the cinnamon stick. Serve the apricots warm on a bed of yogurt, and drizzle over the syrup.
ingredients: 250ml/8¾fl oz cold water,  50g/1¾oz caster sugar,  1 cinnamon stick,  small pinch saffron strands,  1 tbsp honey,  12 apricots, halved,  150g/5¼oz tub Greek yoghurt,  50g/1¾oz pistachios, crushed
